section.title: How to fix the compile time error about missing confetti
section.para:
An error about missing confetti:
Generating prscfg.h, prscfg.c... [ 13%] Generating prscfg.h, prscfg.c /bin/sh: CONFETTI-NOTFOUND: not found
This error is caused by cmake, trying to re-create generated files prscfg.h, prscfg.c in cfg/ directory. These files are under revision control and normally need not to be regenerated. The fix is to
$ git checkout cfg/prscfg.h $ git checkout cfg/prscfg.c $ touch cfg/prscfg.[hc]
The other alternative, if you have actually modified core_cfg.cfg_tmpl is to install confetti from and let cmake use it.

section.title: How to build the user guide from DocBook .xml files
section.para:
To build documentation, you'll need:
xsltproc docbook5-xml docbook-xsl-ns libsaxon-java- for saxon processing libxml-commons-resolver1.1-java libxerces2-java libxslthl-java
